# Agent behavior and decision making

## How base agents respond to requests with offers

```{r, echo = FALSE}

library(DiagrammeR)

mermaid('
  graph TD
  A[What vendor should<br>I sell to?] --> B[Does the contract<br>meet my raw profit]
  A -->C[Does the contract<br>meet my purchase price]
  A -->D[Does the contract<br>meet my landed cost requirements]
  B -->E[Does the contract meet my raw profit, purchase price, and <br>landed cost requirements]
  C -->E
  D -->E
  E -->F[Do not sell to this agent]
  E -->G[Is the quantity requested<br>greater than my minimum order?]
  G --> H[Set offer price.<br>Allow for sale of items]
  G -->I[Do not sell to this agent]
  
  click B "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Producers" "Raw profit"
  click C "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Producers" "Purchase price"
  click D "https://github.com/FoodSystemsModeling/bean-agent-gen/tree/main/Producers" "Landed cost"
  
  classDef whiteBox fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:2px
  class A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I whiteBox
  
')

```
